name: collabcanvas-ai-agent
description: AWS Lambda function for CollabCanvas AI agent with LangChain

scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../function.zip . && cd .. && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name collabcanvas-ai-agent --zip-file fileb://function.zip
scripts.deploy:create: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../function.zip . && cd .. && aws lambda create-function --function-name collabcanvas-ai-agent --runtime nodejs20.x --role arn:aws:iam::YOUR-ACCOUNT-ID:role/lambda-execution-role --handler index.handler --zip-file fileb://function.zip --timeout 30 --memory-size 512
